video.title: House Hunters International Collection
video.synopsis: House hunters and their realtors check out a range of architectural styles and work through the quirks of buying real estate in various countries.

episodes.synopsis: When Michael loses his mother, he and his son, Collin, leave South Florida and return to the family's roots in Vilnius, Lithuania.
episodes.title: Racing Back to Vilnius

episodes.synopsis: Children's book authors Chris and Michelle have a passion for history, which takes them to Majorca, Spain, to renovate a historic estate.
episodes.title: Building a New Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Transferred to Brussels, Belgium, for his job, Todd loves his new home city. His wife, Karin, has a more difficult time adjusting, though.
episodes.title: Being Belgian in Brussels

episodes.synopsis: While her friends begin to settle down, Arlene takes a new job in Cork, Ireland, and embarks on a new chapter in her life.
episodes.title: Put a Cork in it!

episodes.synopsis: With space at a premium in Paris, will newlyweds Jayne and Edouard find enough room for Jayne's medical practice and their future family?
episodes.title: Planning a Future in Paris

episodes.synopsis: After receiving a financial windfall, Mary and her boyfriend, Ben, decide to start life together where they first met: Mission Beach, Australia.
episodes.title: Is Mission Beach Out of Reach?

episodes.synopsis: When Jason lands a job producing major sports events in Glasgow, Scotland, he and his family leave their extended network of relatives in Canada.
episodes.title: Let the Glasgow Games Begin

episodes.synopsis: Bonnie and Kale move to Los Cabos, Mexico, to live together for the first time. Will the experience tear them apart or bring them closer together?
episodes.title: Starting Fresh in Los Cabos

episodes.synopsis: Interviewing for a job in Busan, Korea, while visiting relatives, Andrew and his partner, Marci, realize that they've found the chance of a lifetime.
episodes.title: Business in Beautiful Busan

episodes.synopsis: Laurel moved to Quito, Ecuador, to live with Hugo, and now that they have a baby it's time for the couple to move out of Hugo's family's home.
episodes.title: You've Got the Quito My Heart

episodes.synopsis: Eight years after meeting by chance outside an ice cream shop in Split, Croatia, Sean and Neissa decide to settle down and start a business there.
episodes.title: Torn Over Where to be in Split

episodes.synopsis: Kyle and his wife, Desiree, have one last thing on their pre-baby bucket list, and that's to live abroad -- something Kyle has never done.
episodes.title: Town Center or River Views

episodes.synopsis: When Greg is given a job opportunity in Pattaya, Thailand, he and his wife, Michelle, leap at the chance to dive into a new culture.
episodes.title: Authenticity in Thailand

episodes.synopsis: After living in the city for two decades, Michelle packs her bags and moves to rural Panguipulli, Chile, where she can learn how to farm.
episodes.title: Back to Nature in Chile

episodes.synopsis: Newlyweds Samantha and Giorgio settle down in his native Milan, Italy, but living with his parents proves to be too close for comfort.
episodes.title: Married and Motoring in Milan, Italy

episodes.synopsis: Tired of living with regrets over not seeing the rest of the world, Maisha leaves her life in Brooklyn to move to Ajman in the United Arab Emirates.
episodes.title: When Ajman Loves a Woman

episodes.synopsis: Knowing it's a terrific opportunity for their three kids, Carla and Andrew jump at the chance to move to Cambridge, England.
episodes.title: Seeking More Size in Cambridge

episodes.synopsis: After an attempt to buy a house in Leon, Nicaragua, goes awry, Jeff and Natalie return to Cincinnati to start their search all over again.
episodes.title: Risky Beach Business in Leon

episodes.synopsis: Randy and Rebekah move to France for his job, but Randy wants a modern home while Rebekah wants a property with a traditional French feel.
episodes.title: Living Life in La Baule

episodes.synopsis: When Chris's job transfers him to Frankfurt, Germany, his wife, Katie, is anxious to find a space in which she can feel at home.
episodes.title: Opposing Ideals in Frankfurt

episodes.synopsis: With their business expanding from North Carolina into Europe, Drew and William set their sights on the historic city of Budapest, Hungary.
episodes.title: Business and Budget in Budapest, Hungary

episodes.synopsis: In order to live like locals in Ecuador, a couple searches outside of gated communities but discovers that accommodations aren't like those in America.
episodes.title: Live la Vida Local in Ecuador

episodes.synopsis: When Danielle's boyfriend, Jared, said he'd be willing to move to London, she jumped at the chance to make her dream of living abroad come true.
episodes.title: Been There, London That

episodes.synopsis: Victoria likes to keep busy and Paul likes to relax, so when they look for a vacation home in Olivia, Spain, they must make a compromise.
episodes.title: Opposites Attract in Oliva, Spain

episodes.synopsis: Encouraged by his wife, Sarah, Dave applied to postdoctoral studies all over the world, and now they're on their way to Belfast, Northern Ireland.
episodes.title: Belfast and Furious
